sentences.en: At one time, she was known as arrogant overbearing.
sentences.cn: 她从前的名声是傲慢自大,甚至就年轻女演员而言.

sentences.en: At the office he was mean and overbearing.
sentences.cn: 他在公司里表现得卑鄙专横.

sentences.en: He is never overbearing, though accustomed to command men in the utmost degree below him.
sentences.cn: 尽管他指挥过级别最低的下等兵打仗,他却从不盛气凌人.

sentences.en: He was clever, bad - tem - pered, and overbearing.
sentences.cn: 他聪明, 暴躁, 专横.

sentences.en: He's so overbearing that no one wants to work for him.
sentences.cn: 他那么专横,没人愿为他工作.

sentences.en: Her arched eyebrows and grotesquely powdered face were at once seductive and grimly overbearing.
sentences.cn: 眉棱棱着,在一脸的怪粉上显出妖媚而霸道.

sentences.en: His manner with people is neither overbearing nor self - effacing.
sentences.cn: 他待人的态度一向不卑不亢.

sentences.en: However, we can sometimes turn and become overbearing and domineering.
sentences.cn: 然而, 有时我们也会过分依赖主导功能,变得过于傲慢自大.

sentences.en: Likewise, an overbearing stare can make you appear arrogant and egotistical.
sentences.cn: 此外, 过度的注视会让别人觉得你傲慢而自负.

sentences.en: Overbearing people are not necessarily strong people in life.
sentences.cn: 霸气的人未必就是生活中的强者.

sentences.en: Promoted too quickly, the conceited young man became overbearing.
sentences.cn: 提拔得太快, 那个自负的年轻人变得盛气凌人.

sentences.en: She returns to the big screen to play Candy's overbearing mother, Rose.
sentences.cn: 她又重返大银幕，扮演坎迪专横的母亲罗丝。

sentences.en: Their overbearing bureaucracy and their self - satisfied airs are really more than one can stand.
sentences.cn: 他们那种神气十足的官僚架子实在叫人吃不消.

sentences.en: They were insolent and overbearing to the servants and friends of Penelope.
sentences.cn: 他们对待佩内洛普的仆人和朋友傲慢无礼.

sentences.en: TV critics said the program exploited the stereotype of the overbearing mamma.
sentences.cn: 电视评论说此节目利用了专横妈妈们的一贯做派.

words.tran_cn: 全部的；全体的；一切在内的
过于焦急的；过度操心的
过于活泼，过度活跃；过度活性
过于老化；商品过剩；人工时效过度

trans.tran_en: always trying to control other people without considering their wishes or feelings
